silence.description: You hear nothing around you—only the sound of your own breath and heartbeat.

echoes.description: You hear distant echoes bouncing endlessly, as if the chamber repeats every step you take.

dripping_water.description: You hear the slow, rhythmic drip of water somewhere in the darkness.

distant_chanting.description: You hear distant chanting, low and wordless, as though a ritual is underway far below.

muffled_cries.description: You hear muffled cries, too faint to understand, but impossible to ignore.

whispers.description: You hear whispers curling through the air, speaking in no tongue you know.

clattering_chains.description: You hear chains clattering in the distance, dragging slowly across stone.

roaring_wind.description: You hear a roaring wind that shouldn't exist underground, shaking the walls slightly.

buzzing_insects.description: You hear the persistent buzz of unseen insects, somewhere just beyond the light.

arcane_hum.description: You hear a low, steady hum—arcane in nature, vibrating deep within your bones.
